attributes.action: reject the current shambolic, ugly and indecipherable 2012 olympic logo and accept  submissions for a new logo from the public to be decided on by popular vote.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current 2012 Olympic logo is an eyesore. Public money was wasted on a design that is unrepresentative and confusing. We the public are more than capable of of designing a nicer one for free. We, the undersigned, want a better, more aesthetically pleasing logo to represent our games.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
